long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SN Instance Switcher
Effortlessly manage and switch between your ServiceNow instances without losing track of your records!

With SN Instance Switcher, you can navigate between multiple environments seamlessly while staying on the same record. Perfect for administrators and developers working across multiple ServiceNow domains that share the same configurations and sys_ids.

Key Features:

Switch Domains: Change the domain of the current record with a single click.
Custom Domain Management: Add, edit, or remove domains to tailor your environment list.
Drag-and-Drop Reordering: Organize your domains in the order that suits your workflow.
Quick Access: Open any environment instantly from your list.
Say goodbye to repetitive navigation and manual URL edits—SN Instance Switcher is the smart way to streamline your ServiceNow workflows!

Install it now and make multi-environment management a breeze!
